title: Trinket Price Error
body:
So after just playing a game, I noticed that if you have an upgraded trinket, in the shop menu you can swap to the other trinkets for 250g, but if you click on any of them it's only 75g on the side panel that pops up. Purchasing them only costs 75g, so while there's no direct effect on gameplay and it's just a minor visual error, it's still an error.

The two screenshots are of different stages in the game but they still show the problem.

replies.body:
>both images fail to load

um

Anyway, bug reports go [here](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report). Could just be that they made the upgraded trinket price not upgrade dynamically, like the rest of the items. Maybe it was intentional?
